name: SandCastle
description:
Here is Justin :

He is building a Sand Castle. Let's help him!

How to play :

  • SpaceBar to pass tutorial steps
  • Arrows to move
  • Maintain X to build or evolve a tower
  • Maintain W to build a trench
  • Keep the flag value of your castle above 5

Keep Justin's castle up for as many wave as you can !
